fn.p: Contributors: BH, RL and HW—conceptualisation. BH, RL, DL, LH and HW—data curation. BH, RL, DL and LH—formal analysis. BH, RL, DL, LH and HW—investigation. XW and GY—supervision. BH and HW—original draft. RL, XW and GY—review and editing.

Funding: This trial is supported by the National Key Research and Development Programme, (2019YFC0119100), Shanghai Science and Technology Innovation Action Plan (18441910900), National Natural Science Foundation of China, youth project (81602220) and the Special Diseases Programme of Pudong New Area Health System (PWZzb2017-06).
Patient and public involvement: Patients and/or the public were not involved in the design, or conduct, or reporting, or dissemination plans of this research.
Patient consent for publication: Not required.
Provenance and peer review: Not commissioned; externally peer reviewed.
